chapter.title: Overview
chapter.para: The Spring.NET Social Facebook project is an extension to Spring.NET Social that enables integration with Facebook. The Spring.NET REST Client Framework is used to consume Facebook REST API.

With over 700 million users (and growing), Facebook is the largest online social network. While bringing together friends and family, Facebook also offers a rich platform on which to develop applications.

Spring.NET Social Facebook supports the following .NET Frameworks :
.NET 2.0
.NET Client Profile 3.5 and 4.0
Windows Phone 7.0 and 7.1

As an extension, Spring.NET Social Facebook depends on Spring.NET Social.
Note that Spring.NET Social Facebook may release on a different schedule than Spring.NET Social. Consequently, Spring.NET Social's version may differ from that of Spring.NET Social Facebook.
